message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 no such table: wp_woocommerce_order_items.

[15-Apr-2025 15:40:50 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

SELECT wp_posts.id, wp_woocommerce_order_items.order_item_id FROM wp_posts LEFT JOIN wp_woocommerce_order_items ON wp_posts.ID=wp_woocommerce_order_items.order_id WHERE wp_posts.post_type = 'shop_order' AND wp_posts.post_status IN ( 'wc-completed' ) AND wp_posts.post_date >= '1970-01-01 00:00:00' AND wp_posts.post_date <= '2025-04-15 15:40:50'

Queries made or created this session were:

Executing: SELECT wp_posts.id, wp_woocommerce_order_items.order_item_id FROM wp_posts LEFT JOIN wp_woocommerce_order_items ON wp_posts.ID=wp_woocommerce_order_items.order_id WHERE wp_posts.post_type = :param0 AND wp_posts.post_status IN ( :param1 ) AND wp_posts.post_date >= :param2 AND wp_posts.post_date <= :param3 | parameters: shop_order, wc-completed, 1970-01-01 00:00:00, 2025-04-15 15:40:50
  3. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
